:v-model.description: Values that are bidirectionally bound via v-model

inactiveColor.description: The background color when turned off

value.description: Values that are bidirectionally bound via v-model

activeValue.description: The value when the switch is turned on

inactiveValue.description: The value when the switch is turned off

asyncChange.description: Whether to enable asynchronous change, you need to manually control the input value after it is enabled
asyncChange.description_zh: 是否开启异步变更，开启后需要手动控制输入值

space.description: The distance between the dot and the outer border

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the switch state changes
events.params: value：打开时为activeValue值，关闭时为inactiveValue值

events.name: input
events.description: Triggered when switch is turned on or off (async is not enabled)
events.description_zh: 在switch打开或关闭时触发（没开启异步)
events.params: value：打开时为activeValue值，关闭时为inactiveValue值
